name: Man VS Gravity
description:
This game was created for UPsi Jam 1.0, in Neuchâtel, Switzerland.

Human VS Gravity is a Platform/Shooting, Die and Retry game, made with Unity in which gravity change in certain areas.

The player navigates between two planets, that are about to collide : he needs to leave as fast as possible, to escape from the planets and certain death.

The player will need to avoid dying from the laser platforms or the enemy shooting at him. He will die instantly, meaning he has no margin of error.If the players dies, he restarts the entire level : there is no checkpoint.

He has a gun, to kill enemies before they kill him. He will have to use the gravity change mechanics and the blue platforms to reach the end of the game, his salvation.

Save your hero, and overcome any obstacle !

This version contains 3 levels, with the difficulty increasing.

Controls (Mouse + Keyboard):

  • Move with SD and Arrows, to the left and right
  • Jump with Space
  • Target with the Mouse
  • Shoot with the Left click from the Mouse

Credits :

- Music : Escapism - Yung Logos ( Music without copyright-Attribution not required )

- All other art assets are handmade.
